description.narrative:
• Resilience Plus is an intensive, multifaceted approach to respond immediately to the current food crisis and strengthen local smallholder producers’ resilience to future emergencies. • This project provides cash in exchange for work on critical environmental protection projects. By planting trees, and constructing water and land conservation structures, beneficiaries are reducing agricultural production costs, improving future yields, and protecting their local land and water resources. • LWR’s integration of its Tripartite Rural Financing Model is connecting project beneficiaries with local financial institutions to provide capital for purchasing inputs. Access to credit will allow smallholder farmers to increase and improve their production and post-harvest handling. • Gender-sensitive trainings on processing and marketing are bridging women with entrepreneurial opportunities to improve their family’s livelihoods.
• Cash-for-work participants recovered 940 hectares of land by building 15 water and soil conservation structures, including wire mesh dams and stone retaining walls. Participants earned $43,223 to meet their current food security needs while building resiliency against future shocks in exchange for work to protect communal land assets. • More than 5,500 smallholder producers are equipped to protect their future food security as a result of training and enhanced knowledge around seed production and better agricultural techniques. Smallholder producers and processors will also increase agricultural yields and incomes through access to credit for purchasing inputs and training on production, processing, and post-harvest business management. • 21 trained producers, coached in gender-sensitive training on agricultural production and marketing for improved livelihoods will reach 750 additional smallholder farmers with skills training and messaging on methods for increasing yields, improving post-harvest handling and processing, and strengthening producer capacities in financial management and marketing.
